pages.text: You may have noticed a bar of blue feathers above the hunger bar. Those are your Feathers! Feathers regenerate over time, and can be consumed by pressing R (by default) to perform a dodge. The number of feathers you have is dependent on armor weight. Typically, the bulkier the armor, the more it weighs and the less feathers you have.
Endurance gives extra feathers akin to absorption. Once they are used, they cannot be recovered. Can be brewed with Netherrite Nugget
Energized drastically increases the regeneration rate for feathers. Pairs greatly with heavier armor. Can be brewed with Electrum Nugget
